channel.title: Solomon-Wheeler on Wheeler Genealogy
channel.description: Recent content in Solomon-Wheeler on Wheeler Genealogy

item.title: Wheeler Weekly: The Deputy Sheriff Question (and What I Still Need to Prove)
item.description: Two cataloged legal documents name a Deputy Sheriff Solomon Wheeler during the Revolutionary era. I’ve completed my SAR supplemental application using Solomon’s lineage—now the work is proving the Deputy Sheriff is my 4th great grandfather.

item.title: Finallly A Wheeler
item.description: A long-running Wheeler question: did my 4th great-grandfather Solomon Wheeler support the American Revolution through civil service? New evidence points to civil law enforcement activity in 1777 New Hampshire that may connect to my Solomon.
